```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r packages}

# Load packages
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r data}

# Read in AIS data for 2017, 2018, and 2019
AIS2017 <- read.csv("NEW_AIS_2017.csv")
AIS2018 <- read.csv("NEW_AIS_2018.csv")
AIS2019 <- read.csv("NEW_AIS_2019.csv")

```

```{r filter}

# Filter for "Passenger Ship" to isolate cruise ships
# Write to csv
AIS2017ps <- AIS2017 %>% 
  filter(VESSEL_TYPE == "Passenger Ship") %>% 
  write.csv("AIS2017ps.csv")

AIS2018ps <- AIS2018 %>% 
  filter(VESSEL_TYPE == "Passenger Ship") %>% 
  write.csv("AIS2018ps.csv")

AIS2019ps <- AIS2019 %>% 
  filter(VESSEL_TYPE == "Passenger Ship") %>% 
  write.csv("AIS2019ps.csv")

```
